summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from September 2019 coordinating logistics for victim briefings in the Epstein case. It discusses comparing victim lists between New York and Miami cases, tracking invitations, and confirms the scheduling of briefings in Miramar, FL and New York, NY for October 2019.

persons.name: Sosa
persons.context: Mentioned as having previously reserved a conference room in Miami for the Epstein briefing.

events.title: Epstein Case Victim Briefing - Florida
events.description: A victim briefing meeting scheduled to be held in Miramar, FL, organized by the FBI Victim Services Division, FBI NY Field Office, and SDNY.

events.title: Epstein Case Victim Briefing - New York
events.description: A victim briefing meeting scheduled to be held in New York, NY, organized by the FBI Victim Services Division, FBI NY Field Office, and SDNY.

keyFacts: The FBI was organizing victim briefings for the Epstein case in both Miami and New York in October 2019.
The New York case (31E-NY-3027571) involved 39 victims, while the Miami case (31E-MM-108062) involved 35 victims at the time.
The FBI was coordinating to ensure they had the most updated contact information for victims to send invitations via email and post.
A draft invitation letter was included, offering victims the choice to attend a briefing in Florida on October 15 or New York on October 23, 2019.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination between the DO, NY, and MM (Miami) field offices regarding victim services for the Epstein investigation.
